name: Five Nights at Poe's V1.1.3.B
description:
Can you survive 5 nights at your local pizza place with killer animatronics?

Hide from the vile Poe + Friends before they kill you to follow company policy.

How To:

Press the bottom button to check cameras.

Press the buttons to close the adjacent doors - - but be careful, you have a very limited power supply!

Characters -

Poe

Poe rarely leaves the main stage. If the power runs out, he will run at you and kill you from wherever he is on the map.

Terry

Terry is the most meticulous of the rest of the animatronics. He notices you and will start making his way over to you. 

Stacy

Stacy is unique because she will come from the right side. Be wary of her however, because her bite is lethal.

Gman

Gman will run to you. When his eyes turn red, shut the left door IMMEDIATLY.

Now that you know my tips, you should be able to survive all 6- uh, I mean 5, nights. and if you die, click that continue button. You will restart from the night you died on. What are you waiting for? Play now!
